TopicTitle: Spaceport Mod- Requesting A Moderator To Remove My Mod

Articles.Content:
Hi!

A couple of days back, I release my first ever KSP mod onto the Spaceport- but it was pretty bad. I've just finished the creation of a new (and much, much better mod), and I am kindly requesting that a moderator removes my current mod from the Spaceport (it's my only addon, the Defcon Corp. Orbital Tech. Pack). Thanks for reading,

EsvDefcon

EDIT: I've just uploaded the new mod- the new mod (that I don't need deleting) has a thumbnail of an engine- the old pack (that needs deleting) has an image of my username with a TGN corner banner.

The reason that I am requesting this is because I cannot delete it myself.

Edited February 1, 2014 by EsvDefcon
